hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah reported the Messenger of Allah (May peace be upon him) as saying; The angels invoke blessings on any of you who remains sitting at the place where he says his prayers so long as he is defiled (needs ablution) or stands up, saying:O Allah, forgives him; O Allah, have mercy on him

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي فَضْلِ الْقُعُودِ فِي الْمَسْجِدِ
chapter.eng-name: The Virtue Of Sitting In The Masjid
